name: Smart Traffic
description: This is a project that I did last year. It is a **Smart Traffic** system that uses computer vision to recognize license plate, car's model, car's color, save information to database and stream the data to a web server.

name: Face Recognition
description: This project is for Face Recognition. It will recognize the face in front of the camera and find information about that person from the database.

name: Crowd Counting
description: This is my self project. It is a **Crowd Counting** system that uses computer vision to recognize people in the video and count the number of people. It will show warning when the number of people is over the limit.

name: Smart Parking
description: This is a project that I did when i was in the Lab. It is a **Smart Parking** system that uses computer vision to detect the free and occupied parking space and stream the data to a web server.

name: Smart Parking Re-id
description: This is a project that is upgraded from the previous one. It is a **Smart Parking** system that uses computer vision to detect the free and occupied parking space. It will also recognize the license plate and tracking the car's movement. to re-indentify the car from multiple cameras.
